data.message: It's kind of sad that so many here are taking this so seriously and so personally...Good Lord, relax everyone, there's way better things to argue about over the internet, like "Who Wore it Better" or anything the Kardashians do. Am I right or am I right?

replies.message: Yep... like for generations it was "you say tomato I'll say tomatoes and potato and caramel and so on and so on...lmao😂 this isn't a new thing people. Some folks even say thee when it's only the. It's ok. We have a right to do it the way we want
When you say "good lord, relax" is that pronounced jood lord? 😂
Chris: letters can have more than one pronunciation, you know.
